control.description: composite control consisting of a list control and a thumbnail panel

subitems.subitem:
<controls> <control> <description>background</description> <type>image</type> <posX>0</posX> <posY>0</posY> <width>250</width> <height>360</height> <texture flipY="yes" diffuse="Thumb_Mask.png" mask="DVDCase_coverflow_mask.png">black.png</texture> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>233</posX> <posY>10</posY> <width>15</width> <height>15</height> <texture>overlaywatched.png</texture> <visible>control.hastext(560)+string.contains(#iswatched, yes)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Un-Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>233</posX> <posY>10</posY> <width>15</width> <height>15</height> <texture>overlayunwatched.png</texture> <visible>control.hastext(560)+!string.contains(#iswatched, yes)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Movie Title</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <id>560</id> <posX>20</posX> <posY>9</posY> <width>215</width> <label>#title</label> <font>font16</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control> <control> <description>NO DATA</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <id>0</id> <posX>20</posX> <posY>9</posY> <width>215</width> <label>No Data</label> <font>font16</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>!control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>
<control> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>15</posX> <posY>-10</posY> <width>225</width> <height>53</height> <texture>bg_button_nofocus.png</texture> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>
<control> <type>imagelist</type> <id>1</id> <posX>20</posX> <posY>51</posY> <width>302</width> <height>40</height> <textureWidth>15</textureWidth> <textureHeight>15</textureHeight> <subitems> <subitem>star_nofocus.png</subitem> <subitem>star_focus.png</subitem> </subitems> <orientation>horizontal</orientation> <align>left</align> <imagesToDraw>10</imagesToDraw> <percentage>#rating</percentage> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control> <control> <description>genre</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>70</posY> <width>215</width> <label>Genre #genre</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>ffFFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control> <control> <description>year</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>95</posY> <width>215</width> <label>#year #runtime min #mpaarating</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Director</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>120</posY> <width>215</width> <label>Directed by #director</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control> <control> <description>cast</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>145</posY> <width>215</width> <height>20</height> <label>#cast</label> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> <align>left</align> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>plot</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>195</posY> <width>215</width> <height>70</height> <label>#plot</label> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>control.hastext(560)</visible> </control>

<control> <description>dvdlabel</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>90</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#dvdlabel</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>imdb number</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>110</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#imdbnumber</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>file</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>130</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#file</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>plot outline</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>170</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#plotoutline</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>tagline</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>1000</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#tagline</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>credits</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>250</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#credits</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>thumb</description> <type>label</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>270</posY> <width>1000</width> <label>#thumb</label> <font>font9</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>votes</description> <type>label</type> <posX>50</posX> <posY>100</posY> <width>215</width> <label>(#votes votes)</label> <font>font9</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>mpaa G</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>325</posY> <width>210</width> <keepaspectratio>yes</keepaspectratio> <texture>logos/mpaa/large/mpaa_general.png</texture> <visible>string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated G)</visible> </control> <control> <description>mpaa PG</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>325</posY> <width>210</width> <keepaspectratio>yes</keepaspectratio> <texture>logos/mpaa/large/mpaa_pg.png</texture> <visible>string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated PG)+!string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated PG-13)</visible> </control> <control> <description>mpaa PG-13</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>325</posY> <width>210</width> <keepaspectratio>yes</keepaspectratio> <texture>logos/mpaa/large/mpaa_pg13.png</texture> <visible>string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated PG-13)</visible> </control> <control> <description>mpaa R</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>325</posY> <width>210</width> <keepaspectratio>yes</keepaspectratio> <texture>logos/mpaa/large/mpaa_restricted.png</texture> <visible>string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated R)</visible> </control> <control> <description>mpaa NC17</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>325</posY> <width>210</width> <keepaspectratio>yes</keepaspectratio> <texture>logos/mpaa/large/mpaa_nc17.png</texture> <visible>string.contains(#mpaarating, Rated NC-17)</visible> </control> --> </controls>
